languages.text: {n}Указав на мехадендриты Паскаля, Авель тихо произносит:{/n} "Они всегда помнили. Хранили".
{n}Abel points to Pasqal's mechadendrites and says softly,{/n} "They have always remembered. They have always preserved."
languages.original_text: {n}Указав на мехадендриты Паскаля, Авель тихо произносит:{/n} "Они всегда помнили. Хранили".

languages.text: {n}アベルはパスカルの機械触手を指して穏やかに話す。{/n}「ずっと覚えていたのか。ずっと守っていた」
languages.original_text: {n}Abel points to Pasqal's mechadendrites and says softly,{/n} "They have always remembered. They have always preserved."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベルはパスカルの機械触手を指して穏やかに話す。{/n}「ずっと覚えていたのか。ずっと守っていた」
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}亚伯指着帕斯卡的机械触须，轻声说道。{/n}“它们一直都记得，它们一直保存着那些记忆。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abel points to Pasqal's mechadendrites and says softly,{/n} "They have always remembered. They have always preserved."

traits.locale_text: {n}亚伯指着帕斯卡的机械触须，轻声说道。{/n}“它们一直都记得，它们一直保存着那些记忆。”
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: « Elles n'ont jamais oublié, » {n}déclare Abel à mi-voix en désignant les mécadendrites de Pasqal.{/n} « Elles ont toujours préservé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abel points to Pasqal's mechadendrites and says softly,{/n} "They have always remembered. They have always preserved."

traits.locale_text: « Elles n'ont jamais oublié, » {n}déclare Abel à mi-voix en désignant les mécadendrites de Pasqal.{/n} « Elles ont toujours préservé. »
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel señala las mecadendritas de Pasqal y dice con calma:{/n} «Siempre han recordado, siempre han conservado».
languages.original_text: {n}Abel points to Pasqal's mechadendrites and says softly,{/n} "They have always remembered. They have always preserved."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel señala las mecadendritas de Pasqal y dice con calma:{/n} «Siempre han recordado, siempre han conservado».
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel deutet auf Pasqals Mechadendriten und sagt sanft:{/n} "Sie haben sich immer erinnert. Sie haben immer bewahrt."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel points to Pasqal's mechadendrites and says softly,{/n} "They have always remembered. They have always preserved."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel deutet auf Pasqals Mechadendriten und sagt sanft:{/n} "Sie haben sich immer erinnert. Sie haben immer bewahrt."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel, Pasqal'ın mekadentritlerini işaret edip kısık sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Hiç unutmadılar. Hep tuttular."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel points to Pasqal's mechadendrites and says softly,{/n} "They have always remembered. They have always preserved."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel, Pasqal'ın mekadentritlerini işaret ediyor ve kısık sesle konuşuyor:{/n} "Her zaman hatırlandılar. Her zaman korundular."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
